title.narrative: Inventory, Earthquake And Multi-Hazard Performance Evaluation Of Selected Hospitals And Health Facilities In Islamic Republic Of Iran

description.narrative:
? The project correspond to National priorities as indicated by the official correspondence from Ministry of Health and Medical Education (MoHE) received by UN-Habitat.
? This project falls within the Agreement of Cooperation between GoI ad UN-Habitat signed in 2009, UN-Habitat Country Programme 2018-2021 (currently under government approval) and is in line with the United Nations Development Assistance Framework (UNDAF) 2017-2021.

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

title.narrative: EA 1 : Vulnerability assessment of recent newly-built hospitals and health facilities (health centres, health houses, etc.) providing services after earthquakes, and developing new standards and Study of non-structural retrofitting of Hospitals.
